description: This file contains unit tests for utility functions related to processing audio and image files, as well as formatting files for messaging in the agno.utils.openai module. It uses pytest fixtures and test cases to verify behavior of functions like audio_to_message, images_to_message, and _format_file_for_message, including handling of various file formats, URLs, and error conditions.

methods.name: create_dummy_file
methods.description: Helper function to create a dummy file with specified content at a given path.
